item.title: western cyclocross challenge 2023
item.description: Tech Guide Location: Canmore Nordic Centre Canmore Course: stravalink Western Challenge CX. This race is done in age groups to get points for call-ups for Nationals and what have you. results ABA Results CrossResults Podia Elite/Open Women Ella MYERS Christiane BILODEAU Francesca SEAL Junior Women Nico KNOLL Maria MCCARTNEY Keely HAMILTON U15 Women Hazel ROBERTS Eliza MCRAE U17 Women Lydia STACK-MICHASIW Brooke BATES Ella EIDSVIK Elite/Open Men Eric BERG Ryan MACLEAN Manu MOORE U15 Men James CHALKLEY William KINDZIERSKI Finlay ROBERTS U17 Men Ethan WOOD Larix HALLETT Quinten MACKLEM Masters Men 35-44 Andrew DAVIDSON Graham DIEHL Jesse BAUER Masters Men 45-54 Mark KNOLL Paul MARTIN David ROBERTS Masters Men 55-64 Ed GARVIN Peter LAWRENCE Robert MARTENS Masters Men 65+ Gregory PATYCHUK Ken GERMAINE John ATTO Masters Women 35-44 Pepper HARLTON Bridget LINDER Jenn PROCHE Masters Women 45-54 Susanne MCARTHUR Shantel KOENIG Shawna DONALDSON Masters Women 55-64 Rachel DUMONT Junior Men Ben MORIN Colton ZABOLOTNEY Rhett BATES my results Did not race read more

item.title: school of cross 2023
item.description: Tech Guide Location: Capilano Park Edmonton Course: stravalink Like the previous day’s Jim Horner Grand Prix ERTC’s School of Cross (p/b Blindman Brewing) 2023 race happened in Capilano Park. The air quality was a bit better on the day so only one race was cancelled (Open Women). results ABA Results CrossResults Podia Elite/Open Men Mark FAGNAN Graham FRANCIS Ryan MCLEAN Expert Men Paulo ALVES 1 Jacob PLAYFAIR Randy PERRY Novice Men Quinten MACKLEM2 Emmett MACKLEM Evan KINDZIERSKI Sport Men Ethan MCGHAN Ryan ARYCHUK Colin WEIR CHABA Sport Women Rachel DUMONT [^3] Kristin BAKER Madeline MAGLEO my results Did not race read more Earned promotion up to Open Men, with his second win (in a row, following JHGP) in Expert.
